learning_objective: Modify, remix, or incorporate portions of an existing program into one's own work, to develop something new or add more advanced features.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex's friend, Jamie is hearing impaired. Alex wants to modify the existing video game code they created, so Jamie can also enjoy the game using subtitles for sound-based clues within the game. What change should Alex make in the existing code to add subtitles?",
    "Answer1": "Alex should add a caption line after each corresponding sound statement in the code.",
    "Answer2": "Alex needs to eliminate all sound commands from the code.",
    "Answer3": "Alex should convert all the sound files into text files.",
    "Answer4": "Alex needs to change the game language to one that Jamie understands.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "Adding a caption or subtitle line corresponding to each sound or dialogue after the sound statements will help in translating the audio into readable form for Jamie.",
    "code_snippet": "action StarGame()\n    playSound(\"Start.wav\")\n    //add caption here\nend\n\naction playSound(text soundFile)\n    output \"Playing -> \" + soundFile\n    // add caption here\nend"
}
